summary: This module implements utilities for managing project help documentation. It parses command‑line arguments, clones or downloads help sources, processes markdown files into HTML, extracts media URLs, generates translation templates, and provides functions to build, install, or update the help content in configurable directories.
business_intent: Enable developers or deployment scripts to automatically prepare, install, and keep up‑to‑date the user‑facing help files for the application, supporting localization and media handling.
